scripts.build-report: npx shadow-cljs run shadow.cljs.build-report app target/build-report.html
scripts.test: bb export-vars test/unit_emulators/firebase.json && source env.firebase && firebase emulators:exec --project my-haggadah --config test/unit_emulators/firebase.json 'npm run test:build && node target/ci-setup.js && npx karma start --single-run'
scripts.test:watch: firebase emulators:exec --project my-haggadah 'npx shadow-cljs watch ci ci-setup'
scripts.emulators: bb export-vars firebase.json && source .env.firebase && firebase emulators:start --project my-haggadah --config local_emulators/firebase.json --import=emulator_data --export-on-exit=emulator_data
scripts.acceptance: cd test/acceptance && npm run acceptance:base && pwd && firebase emulators:exec --project my-haggadah --config ../acceptance_emulators/firebase.json 'npm run acceptance:setup && lein test :only acceptance.view-haggadah-test'
scripts.acceptance:setup: npx shadow-cljs compile acceptance-setup && node target/default-haggadah-setup.js
scripts.acceptance:base: cp -r resources  test/acceptance && npx shadow-cljs release acceptance
